definition: (used when listing or enumerating items) also, a whole individual unit
details:
adverb
- (used when listing or enumerating items) also
= example: (used when listing or enumerating items) also
noun
- a whole individual unit
- an isolated fact that is considered separately from the whole
= synonyms: point, detail
- a distinct part that can be specified separately in a group of things that could be enumerated on a list
= example: a distinct part that can be specified separately in a group of things that could be enumerated on a list
= synonyms: point
- an individual instance of a type of symbol
= synonyms: token
- a small part that can be considered separately from the whole
= synonyms: particular, detail
